Tooltip: This activity creates a new bucket in the specified folder. If no folder is provided, then it creates one in the current folder.

Arguments.Name: Folder
Arguments.Tooltip: Folder to search for buckets. If not specified, uses the current folder that the process is running within.

Arguments.Name: BucketName
Arguments.Tooltip: Name for the bucket to be created

Arguments.Name: BucketDescription
Arguments.Tooltip: Description for the bucket to be created
